short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store, execute & automate AI tasks with simplified prompt chaining — on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Blaze is a revolutionary browser extension that simplifies and automates AI tasks through advanced prompt chaining. It's an essential tool for AI enthusiasts, content creators, researchers, and professionals looking to get the most out of LLM models like ChatGPT & Claude — without having to use API's.

Let's face it – leveraging AI effectively can be complex. 

For many individuals and businesses, creating and managing sophisticated AI workflows is a daunting task. With PromptBlaze, however, you'll enhance your productivity with a simple to use, yet powerful tool for AI prompt management and automation.

PromptBlaze can help you:

• Execute Universal Prompts – Select text on any website, right-click, and run custom AI prompts instantly without leaving the page.

• Leverage Dynamic Variables – Automatically incorporate additional context from web pages, including special features for Amazon and YouTube (more coming soon).

• Create Multi-Step Prompt Chains – Build complex AI workflows by linking multiple prompts together for improved outputs from LLM's like ChatGPT & Claude.

• Boost Productivity – Streamline your AI-driven processes across various online platforms.

And so much more.

Key Features:

• Universal Prompt Execution
• Platform-Specific Variables (Amazon, YouTube)
• Prompt Storage and Organization
• Multi-Step Prompt Chaining
• Task Automation
• User-Friendly Interface

Whether you're researching books on Amazon, analyzing YouTube content, or working with AI across any website, PromptBlaze provides the tools you need to work smarter, not harder.

Supported AI Platforms:
- Claude
- ChatGPT
- Perplexity
- Open WebUI (Local LLM models & API access to 100's more).

Please note: Prompt Blaze is NOT free to use and requires a paid account.

We're constantly updating PromptBlaze to enhance your AI workflow experience. If you have any questions or feedback, we'd love to hear from you. You can always get in touch at: support@promptblaze.com
